parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the last model successfully opened by SOLIDWORKS

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Options in effect when FileName opened as defined in swOpenDocOptions_e

title: ISldWorks.GetOpenedFileInfo
description: Gets the name of the last model successfully opened by SOLIDWORKS and the options that were in effect when it opened.
signature:
void GetOpenedFileInfo( 
   out System.String
FileName
,
   out System.Int32
Options
)

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the last model successfully opened by SOLIDWORKS

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Options in effect when FileName opened as defined in swOpenDocOptions_e

remarks: This method considers only models opened through the SOLIDWORKS Design user interface. This method does not consider models successfully opened through the API, unless the API opens an assembly. In that case, each assembly component is opened by SOLIDWORKS, and this method determines which of those assembly's components was successfully opened last.
